caption: The service was amazing, I don't know the name of the lady but she was very helpful and friendly I visit this store on 3/5/21 at 9:46 am the guys doing the smoothie where great as well.I will be back
They were fast and friendly.
They make the best smoothies❤

Great smoothies...subpar service...imagine that when all one has to do is take the order, make the order, and send you on your way. Unfortunately, service get slower EVERY visit and yet the staff is increasing.  Today 8-7-20, not only was the wait greater than expected (10-15mins) prior to ordering. Once inside, no order or regulation and the staff (4 people in total) were more engrossed in conversing with one another than working. Faith the “shift lead” sits in the back and only two staff were attempting to deal with the rest of us. Surprisingly, I ended getting my order LAST after those I had originally ordered before. I don’t know what to think, but whomever is managing this location needs to rethink some things.
Best smoothies around

I just left this location and barely made it in time for my smoothie. Britany was so sweet and told me to order whatever I wanted although I could see that they had put away almost everything. She and another young lady were very friendly and I really appreciated it. I will definitely be back to this location.
I started ordering via the app and my order is always ready when I get there! Staff is always very pleasant!
I love this place, sooo healthy. Smoothies are life, GO TRY IT
Good social distancing policy.  Wait is not long .
Associates are always friendly and make perfect smoothies

Ordered online and I called the location to ask if they could cancel the order. This was right after I placed the order^. Then when I called not once not twice they still didn't pick up, which then I used my friends phone and they picked up immediately. The employee who was on the phone was extremely rude and refused to cancel the order which I politely asked of him when they had said they already made it, How can you make a smoothie in w sec. I was simply just calling to cancel the order, oh well I lost 6 bucks but rude customer service. Then they hung up the phone. Called Another two times and it went straight to voicemail, then they picked up and hung up again! Extremely rude Employee, Will not ever order from Bowie!

When you spend 8-9$ on a strawberry smoothie, you don’t want it to have a weird taste. It seems like the water their using is bad, or the strawberries have gone bad. I’m not sure how you mess up a strawberry extreme. Other smoothie kings are not like this.
Love. Support local business owners!
Fantastic and flavorful food, I love the character the spot has, and the staff members were nice. Will surely come back.

The smoothies and conditions are good, the store is always clean.  The owner is a sweetheart and you can see the passion when she’s there.  The kids that work there have no concept of being professional/friendly.  This was not the case when the store first opened.  Some barely speak or crack a smile when I approach the register.  They talk about their personal lives which is fine, but it shouldn’t be loud enough for everyone to hear.
This smoothie king is decent
The best smoothies
Good smoothies, I recommend the peanut butter carrot and chocolate smoothie.

Im so over this place.  The smoothies are decent but theyre always SO slow with no sense of urgency, just shy of professional (usually talking amongst themselves), and it never looks clean from this side of the counter.  I went in on a Friday when supposedly all 32oz smoothies are $5 but it over $6 dollars in total because I picked the magic exception.  I just won't bother anymore.

Smoothie King Franchises, Inc., the original U.S. smoothie franchise, is a privately held, Dallas-based franchise company with 1,000 units worldwide. It was founded in 1973 by Steve Kuhnau, whose mission was to help others achieve better health in a delicious way through smoothies.  Today, it continues its “Smoothies With A Purpose” mission through its Clean Blends Initiative that focuses on more whole fruits and vegetables while removing all added sugars, artificial flavors, colors and preservatives and added sugars in many of our blends. The franchise is currently ranked No. 1 by Entrepreneur magazine in the juice bar category for the 26th year, No. 35 overall on the 2017 Franchise 500 list and debuted on the Inc. 5000 list in 2018. The company also offers retail products that include sports beverages, energy bars, vitamins, supplements and more.

This location in Bowie Town shopping center has terrible service. My smoothie had to be remade and they only fill my 40 oz cup three quarters of the way.  When i asked them where is the rest of the smoothie. They said do you want some ice in it.

Service is quick ,and the smoothies taste amazing! They have a lot of options for snacks and other supplements. They are also right across from La fitness which is another bonus! Great place to grab a smoothie !
The food is always well prepared and delightful, workers gives fantastic customer service. I really like the cleanliness and mood. Keep up the good work.
Great tasting and refreshing smoothies. Fast Excellent service. Extremely Clean store and restroom.
Enjoyed my smoothie.

Love the smoothies. Parking is always plentiful. Why are the male employees always looking so miserable though? NEVER a greeting from the young men, only from the young ladies. Keep up the great work ladies.
Apart from the time when the machine broke and they couldn't take cash, the service was good. They have a big lady staff that refuses to smile all the time I went there.:(
Actually tastes good and is healthy
Hitting the pure recharge or immune builder
R u serious, 5$ fridays is littie, erebody doing it, dont hear about it, be about and show face, tell em X sent you.

You should buy smoothies from Ms Tonya’s business even if you don’t drink smoothies!!  She bailed me out of poor planning for a meeting I was hosting by driving from her store 25 minutes away to delivery 12 smoothies for me.  She offered right away to bring them to me and I couldn’t believe the level of customer service.  She was extremely pleasant and shared her passion for her company and her people.  It is always refreshing to see the outward display of customer service for something as simple as a smoothie.  If I lived closer I would visit her shop every day and buy from her.  Thanks Ms. Tonya!!

MsTanya is the best!! Hands down!! However as in all businesses if you aren’t there all the time it’s vital that extensions of you are.  I get the exact same drink every time and some days it’s perfect some days it’s watery and if you’ve ever had a strawberry hulk you know it’s no place for looseness.. I’ve spoken with Ms Tanya about it but tonight another watery strawberry hulk.  It may be to my benefit to drive out of my way to Crofton /Waugh Chapel so I can get my order right without spending my money to be Disappointed.
Good product
Best quick way to get a healthy meal replacement or supplement to your diet!
Love the smoothies especially on Friday for the $5 smoothies.
Very friendly and effecient
The staff there are always pleasant and get my orders right!
A great place to go for HEALTHY food! Great personnel also
Staff here tonight was excellent. My first time at this location visiting from Baltimore and I loved it. Akira was new here yet smoothies were on point! I will definitely be back.
Very Professional
Enjoyed their smoothies
Healthy smoothies of various tastes.
Tried smoothie king for the first time. The cashier was extremely helpful in helping me pick a smoothie and it tasted so good! Will be back!

I absolutely love the staff and their attitudes so friendly an upbeat! My favorite is the peanut Power House meal replacement smoothie! They also have buy one get one free coupons, $5 + $6 32 oz Fridays. Will definitely keep coming back

I'm giving it a 2 star because I hadn't eaten all day, I decide to get a smothie instead of a burger but I ended up getting something like food poisoning after drink my smoothie. as much as I like them I dont think I can go back.
Great low calorie options
Ginger smoothie was really good!!
They never disappoint me. Their service is great! They are polite and courteous and their smoothies are delicious!
Friendly and fast service. After recommending a smoothie to me today,..one of the team members made sure I was pleased with my Strawberry Kiwi Smoothie. I wish I got her name, she was a sweetheart! 😄

username: DMV Gamechangers Tiff, Harlem and Jonathan

caption: Not good

I've been going to this smoothie King since they opened up. The service has gotten drastically worse. The kids they have working for them are rude, and probably getting paid minimum wage. I honestly think they're charging extra for things they don't need to, just to line their pockets. They make their drinks with incorrect ratios that create more smoothie than the drink calls for and then charge the customer to get the rest of the drink they paid for. We had a terrible experience with the young boy and girl working that day. The  boy double charged us and left the transaction pending for a WEEK before it was finally closed. Apparently protein isn't an enhancer these days. We were over them when the young girl told me I'd need to pay extra for the rest of my drink and laughed. I was even more over them when the pompous manager says this is how they became #1 in the district. Perhaps their business plan should include using the correct amount of ingredients and minimizing waste. Maybe then employees wouldn't have to be petty. Stop taking advantage of your customers Fortunately this is not the closest one to me so they can all shove off.😊
Love it love love it......download the app

I’ve been a customer at the Bowie, Maryland location since they opened approximately one year ago. The customer service has drastically changed.   Attitude reflects leadership, and I must say it has made a turn for the worst ever.  Starting with the Owner -Managing operator, who has no respect for no one.   She hires young kids that exhibits no level of professionalism and it appears she’s ok with it.   Every time I place my order,  it taste different and isn’t consistent to Smoothie King standards.   Last week, one of her female employees got into a verbal disrespectful shouting match with me, when I requested that she not make my protein shake.  The manager had the ordasity to tell me that she ( this young lady ) was her best employee.  I replied to the owner -manager , “That if she’s  your best employee you are in major trouble”, the manager walked off sucking her teeth and acting just as immature as her staff.   I’m not surprised by all the negative reviews on this location.  I do intend on contacting Smoothie King corporate franchise office to see if they can assist in retraining and evaluating the ownership.  It is disheartening that I had to resort to writing this review on a neighborhood business of ours.   BEWARE!  Your smoothie will never be consistent and the staff will get an attitude if you complain, which is truly ignorant and unbusiness like.

Now i go to this Smoothie King as often as i can. It’s the cleanest one near me and the owner is a very nice woman. I get the same order every time i come here. Today, there was a young man working with 2 other men. He hold me he couldn’t switch out one of the frozen items for a different one; he’d have to charge me extra. This is news and none of them have ever done that. I was upset with it but tried to explain that this is my usual order. I wasn’t angry until he smirked. I wasn’t angry until he laughed. I wasn’t angry until he kept making side glances to his coworkers. I’ve never been treated like that before in a Smoothie King and, quite frankly, i don’t want to go back to this one if that’s how an employee is going to interact with me.
They have some really good ass smoothies. My favorite one is the watermelon one.
Love my smoothie especially after my workout. Great specials too!  Mondays $6 and Fridays $5 smoothies. Quick friendly serve.

The first Smoothie King I ever went to. I love it! I remember the first smoothie I had was a Strawberry Kiwi Breeze. My Dad my two brothers and I went to this smoothie king almost every Friday for $5 friday.
Best of he Best any hour of the day!

This is normally our favorite Smoothie King but over the last couple of months it has went down in value... Many of the kids there are talking and don't take pride in their work, the owner is very nice and goes to our Church.  Why are the good server leaving. We go out to Crofton now for better service.

Today I waited 50 minutes for a smoothie that was remade multiple times and still came up short. I attempted to get the attention of the workers multiple times to ask why this process was taking so long. I was ignored. I will not return.
never answers the phone
Was in such a rush, missed out on bfast and decided on the next best alternative Banana Boat (MR) meal replacement was delicious
An absolutely great team of young people!!
I love smoothie king. I find it to be the best choice when you don't have a healthy meal on hand.
Sofa King Smooth.
Good
A great place to go when you don't have time to do the blending at home
Great smoothies!
This is your what you would expect from Smoothie King, it is clean, they make smoothies and the staff are nice
it's so good I lost 30 pounds
This is my home away from home! Actually... I think I'll go there right now.
